definition.text: The referral program is designed to incentivize both word-of-mouth and influencer referrals. You may earn tokens for each user you refer, but also for each user they refer as well, and the chain goes on infinitely!

paragraphs.text: When you declare one or more referrers, you confer them 10% of your Referral Power, but without losing any of your power! That is, you are not giving your power away… you’re empowering someone else through your power!

The power you confer to your referrer is added to his or her own power. Now, guess what happens when your referrer declares his or her referrer? That's right! 10% of the total Referral Power is conferred to his or her referrer too! And the chain continues on and on.

Now, let’s look at this the other way round. The people you refer confer 10% of their Referral Power to you. When they get to refer people, they get 10% of their Referral Power. This means that you get 10% of the Referral Power from the first generation of people you refer, but you also get 1% of the power of the second generation, and 0.1% of the third generation, and so on!
At the time of each Distribution Event, your total Referral Power determines the Direct Proportion of tokens you get from the Referral Reward Pool.
As you can see, there is a very good incentive for spreading the word about Superalgos. It’s good for you, for your friends, for their friends, and for the project!
